summary: Stan Goldberg  was an American comic book artist.
full_text: Stan Goldberg  was an American comic book artist, best known for his work with Archie Comics and as a Marvel Comics colorist who in the 1960s helped design the original color schemes of Spider-Man, the Fantastic Four and other major characters. He was inducted into the National Cartoonists Society Hall of Fame in 2011.
title: Stan Goldberg
